greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lengths of maximal subsequences without adjacent equal terms in the sequence of prime gaps.
comment: Prime gaps are differences between adjacent prime numbers.
Essentially the same as A145024. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 16 2020
formula: Ones correspond to balanced prime quartets (A054800), so the sum of terms up to but not including the n-th one is A000720(A054800(n - 1)) = A090832(n).
xref: The version for the Kolakoski sequence is A306323.
The weakly decreasing version is A333212.
The weakly increasing version is A333215.
The strictly decreasing version is A333252.
The strictly increasing version is A333253.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Mar 15 2020
